name: Cirkill: The Game
description:
This is pretty difficult top-down action game, which point is to collect all the pizza on level. There are three levels with their own differences, namely, the first one has walls that switches due player special ability, second level has breakable obstacles and third generates randomly. Also, game has several enemy types with unique behaviors.

This is literally my first game, so I make it for practice, but I liked the result so much I decided to finalize and show it. Cirkill was made with C++ programming language, using SFML library.

The real challenge of the game is speedruning. So, if you found out you made good run and want to show it, Cirkill has discord server with spedrun scoreboard, you're welcome to visit: https://discord.gg/QGcv5MgR
